document_data.name: Glishman
document_data.mainbody: '''Glishman the Annoying''' was a [[wizard]] who lived in [[Ravens Bluff]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/58/The Living City: Of Wits and Wizards, A Logic Puzzle|27}}
document_data.Home: Glishman lived in a red run-down two-story house on [[Magician's Row]] with a [[shield]] over the door. It was the third of five houses.
document_data.Description: Glishman had a [[toad]] [[familiar]], smoked Golden Sea [[tobacco]], and was primarily a [[milk]] drinker.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1357 DR]], the [[City Guard (Ravens Bluff)|City Guard]] serving Regent of the Exchequer [[Vernon Condor]] considered Glishman the Annoying for the theft of two minor [[magic item]]s of historical importance from the city vaults, after suspicions and [[divination]]s tracked the thieves to Magician's Row. However, Glishman was innocent.
